test_isAllowedToMint_fromAllowlistAttest.notice: Having falsy attestation value should not allow minting.
After receiving a valid allowlist attestation, the account should be able to mint.

test_isAllowedToMint_fromCoinbaseQuestAt.notice: Having falsy attestation value from Coinbase attestor should not allow minting.
After receiving a valid attestation from the Coinbase Quest attestor,         the account should be able to mint.

test_isAllowedToMint_fromInvite_succeeds.notice: Account that received an attestation from the OptimistInviter contract by going         through the claim invite flow should be able to mint.

test_isAllowedToMint_fromWrongAllowlistA.notice: Attestation from the wrong allowlist attestor should not allow minting.

test_isAllowedToMint_fromWrongCoinbaseQu.notice: Coinbase quest attestation from wrong attestor should not allow minting.

test_isAllowedToMint_fromWrongOptimistIn.notice: Claiming an invite on the non-official OptimistInviter contract should not allow          minting.

test_isAllowedToMint_withMultipleAttesta.notice: Having multiple signals, even if one is invalid, should still allow minting.

test_isAllowedToMint_withoutAnyAttestati.notice: Base case, a account without any relevant attestations should not be able to mint.

test_isAllowedToMint_fromAllowlistAttest.notice: Having falsy attestation value should not allow minting.
After receiving a valid allowlist attestation, the account should be able to mint.

test_isAllowedToMint_fromCoinbaseQuestAt.notice: Having falsy attestation value from Coinbase attestor should not allow minting.
After receiving a valid attestation from the Coinbase Quest attestor,         the account should be able to mint.

test_isAllowedToMint_fromInvite_succeeds.notice: Account that received an attestation from the OptimistInviter contract by going         through the claim invite flow should be able to mint.

test_isAllowedToMint_fromWrongAllowlistA.notice: Attestation from the wrong allowlist attestor should not allow minting.

test_isAllowedToMint_fromWrongCoinbaseQu.notice: Coinbase quest attestation from wrong attestor should not allow minting.

test_isAllowedToMint_fromWrongOptimistIn.notice: Claiming an invite on the non-official OptimistInviter contract should not allow          minting.

test_isAllowedToMint_withMultipleAttesta.notice: Having multiple signals, even if one is invalid, should still allow minting.

test_isAllowedToMint_withoutAnyAttestati.notice: Base case, a account without any relevant attestations should not be able to mint.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct AttestationStation.AttestationData memory[] memory)
function (uint256) pure returns (struct AttestationStation.AttestationData memory[] memory)
function (struct OptimistInviter.ClaimableInvite memory) view external returns (bytes32)

documentation.text: @notice Get signature as a bytes blob, since SignatureChecker takes arbitrary signature blobs.
@notice Base case, a account without any relevant attestations should not be able to mint.
@notice After receiving a valid allowlist attestation, the account should be able to mint.

@notice After receiving a valid attestation from the Coinbase Quest attestor,
         the account should be able to mint.

@notice Account that received an attestation from the OptimistInviter contract by going
         through the claim invite flow should be able to mint.
@notice Attestation from the wrong allowlist attestor should not allow minting.
@notice Coinbase quest attestation from wrong attestor should not allow minting.

@notice Claiming an invite on the non-official OptimistInviter contract should not allow
          minting.
@notice Having multiple signals, even if one is invalid, should still allow minting.
@notice Having falsy attestation value should not allow minting.
@notice Having falsy attestation value from Coinbase attestor should not allow minting.
